entry.title: Flood Watch issued July 30 at 12:47AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: .Monsoonal moisture in place over the region will lead to numerous thunderstorms Saturday...especially during the afternoon and evening hours. entry.title: Red Flag Warning issued July 30 at 3:17AM PDT until July 30 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Abundant Lightning On Dry Fuels Expected This Weekend... .Heat, instability, and increasing moisture along with a couple of low pressure impulses moving through today and Sunday into Monday are expected to bring scattered thunderstorms and abundant lightning on dry fuels this weekend. entry.cap:areaDesc: Western Klamath National Forest
